title: Japan Machine Tool Orders
description: Machine Tool Orders in Japan increased to 150848 JPY Million in September from 139327 JPY Million in August of 2022. Machine Tool Orders in Japan averaged 90635.68 JPY Million from 1983 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 182860 JPY Million in March of 2018 and a record low of 19037 JPY Million in January of 2009. Machine Tool Orders measures the change in the total value of new orders placed with machine tool manufacturers. This page provides - Japan Machine Tool Orders- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Japan Machine Tool Builders' Association (JMTBA)
